r.d: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
r.n:
This is fourth beta release of 2.2.0 SDK. It includes more features to support new Couchbase Server 4.5 release and bug fixes.
Changes: * PCBC-380: support AT_PLUS consistency * PCBC-381: support for Full Text Search queries * Various minor fixes and improvements
